FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Q: How does it work?
A: Itâ€˜s designed to be a helpful assistant. You can use it to do things like write a first draft, come up with ideas, add information from outside sources, find the right tone, handle hard conversations, and more. Just type your instructions in the box.

Q: How do I install it?
A: EmailGenius is a Chrome extension that works with Gmail. To install it, go to the Chrome Web Store and click the â€œAdd to Chromeâ€ button. Then, open Gmail in a new tab and start writing an email.

Q: Does it work for Outlook or other email platforms?
A: Right now, it only works for Gmail.

Q: Does EmailGenius read my emails?
A: No. It doesnâ€™t access, store, or transmit your emails or other sensitive personal data. For details, see the Privacy Policy.

Q: How can I trust that you donâ€™t read my emails?
A: The code for the EmailGenius Chrome extension is open source and published on Github.

Q: Does it work for languages other than English?
A: Yes! Just tell it the language you want to use. For example: â€œWrite a birthday greeting in French.â€

Q: Can I customize the writing style?
A: Yesâ€”you can give detailed instructions about tone and style, like: â€œMake it professional and respectful, but not too formal.â€

Q: Can I use my own OpenAI API key?
A: Not yet, but that feature is coming soon.

Q: How do I request a feature or report a bug?
A: Email hello@emailgenius.app or open an issue on Github.

Q: How do I cancel my subscription?
A: Email hello@emailgenius.app from the email address associated with your account.
